channel.title: Portfolios on Adriana Kelly's Storyboarding Portfolio!
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Adriana Kelly's Storyboarding Portfolio!

item.title: You'll Be Back: Part 1
item.description: A tiefling named Arix tries to save her warlock mom from carrying out the bidding of her evil patron, Jack Frost, but they don’t escape in time. Will be synched to “You’ll Be Back” from the Hamilton soundtrack when finished!

item.title: You'll Be Back: Part 2
item.description: A tiefling named Arix tries to save her warlock mom from carrying out the bidding of her evil patron, Jack Frost, but they don’t escape in time. Will be synched to “You’ll Be Back” from the Hamilton soundtrack when finished!

item.title: You'll Be Back: Part 3
item.description: A tiefling named Arix tries to save her warlock mom from carrying out the bidding of her evil patron, Jack Frost, but they don’t escape in time. Will be synched to “You’ll Be Back” from the Hamilton soundtrack when finished!

item.title: Tiny Batman
item.description: A true childhood story about breaking my head open.

item.title: Introducing: Adri!
item.description: This short gives you some idea about where I’m REALLY from.

item.title: Drawing Bully
item.description: A short sequence about being bullied in a school hallway.

item.title: Make America GRATE Again
item.description: An assignment project that had to somehow involve a cheese grater, taco stand, Napoleon Bonaparte, Queen Victoria, and Harry Potter. The result is as chaotic as you’d imagine.

item.title: Perfectionism Demon
item.description: A struggling artist accidentally conjures the demon of perfection, who wants to “help” him (to be continued).
